defaultCurrency.title: Let's select your default currency
defaultCurrency.description: Selected currency will be used by default for your wishes. You can always change it in your profile settings.

dateOfBirth.title: When is your birthday?
dateOfBirth.description: Birthdays are public. You can set your birthday later in your profile settings.

profileVisibility.title: Do you want to share your wishlist?
profileVisibility.description: If you choose to make your wishlist private, it won't be visible for the others. You can always change it in your profile settings.

username.title: First, let’s pick your unique username
username.description: Usernames are public. Choose wisely, as you won't be able to change it later.

reservedWishesVisibility.title: Do you want to see if your wishes are reserved by someone?
reservedWishesVisibility.description: By default this setting is turned off. If you choose to turn it on, you will see a little <badge>reserved</badge> badge next to the wishes that are reserved by someone but you won't see by whom. You can always change it in your profile settings.

fistWish.title: You are all set!
fistWish.subTitle: Now let’s create your first wish.

error.UNAUTHORIZED: Oops, you are not authorized to see this page
error.OAUTH_ERROR: Oops, an error happened while we were trying to sign you in. Please try again.
error.USER_NOT_FOUND: Oops, we were looking very hard but could not find this page... Perhaps there is a typo in the URL?
error.WISH_IS_NOT_RESERVED: Wish reservation can not be cancelled because wish is not reserved
error.WISH_IS_RESERVED_BY_ANOTHER_USER: Wish is reserved by another user
error.TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS_TO_GENERATE_USERNAME: Too many attempts to generate username
error.UNKNOWN: An error happened but we don't know why :( Please try again.
error.persistingErrorHint: If the issue persists, please reach out to us at <email>support@mywishcraft.app</email>.
